titles.title: A bill to authorize a certificate of documentation and a coastwise and fishery endorsement for the vessel Reel Class.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5517)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 103-76.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 117.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/5/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
